subitem.name: Add location
subitem.description: This adds a location to the HouseAgent database.

subitem.name: Manage locations
subitem.description: This manages locations in the HouseAgent database.

subitem.name: Register plugin
subitem.description: This registers a new plugin in the network.

subitem.name: Plugin status
subitem.description: This shows an status overview of all the plugins in the network.

subitem.name: Manage plugins
subitem.description: This manages plugins in the HouseAgent database.

subitem.name: Add device
subitem.description: This adds a new device to the HouseAgent database.

subitem.name: Device control
subitem.description: This page lists information about lighting and control devices, this basically is any device that has a controlable function.

subitem.name: Device overview
subitem.description: This displays an overview of all the devices in the database. (Current status etc.)

subitem.name: Manage devices
subitem.description: This page allows management of the devices created in the HouseAgent database.

subitem.name: Create event
subitem.description: This page allows you to create a new event, and manage triggers and actions associated with the event.

subitem.name: Manage events
subitem.description: This page allows you to manage events.

subitem.name: Create graph
subitem.description: This page allows you to create a graph, based upon historic data.
